name: Galaxy Hold'em
description:
What happens when you put together a space shooter and poker night? That's right, Galaxy Hold'em!

Shoot your way through the wave of enemies, gambling for upgrades to your ship along the way. Use WASD or the arrow keys to move, click on the cards on your hand to select them and play pairs, straights, royal flushes and all that good stuff to get more firepower!

This is an idea prototyped in less than 48 hours for the Kenney Jam 2019, with the theme "unlikely combinations", using only assets made by Kenney (https://kenney.nl/assets).
